title: scirpts/cheating out of hand on OCE
body:
It really is beyond a joke now, every single game either has scripters or bots or both. Some games have 4-6 obvious scripters and some have 9 bots. 

no wonder oce can't compete vs na/eu

replies.body: ive actually seen more people that complain about scripters than actual 100% scripters themselves. its almost as if, its the same people claiming their lane opponent is a scripter when they lose lane. i wish you lot didnt find out about the term
I have never once seen these boys that people complain about
they are always in co-op ai, and normals
I've been 100% positive about a bot once. Been suspicious of scripters a handful of times.  Been playing since 2009.

Ive have never ever played against a scripter and played with a bot once on rift and we still won. 

Were they at?
